name: 16 Interactive
description:
16 Interactive is a web design and development company based in Cheltenham, UK.  Our team of experienced digital designers and developers are passionate about delivering solutions tailored to individual needs on time and on budget.  
Our expertise is based around the following areas: web design and development, Ecommerce platform, web applications and mobile apps.
With a diverse range of clients and brands throughout the UK and worldwide we are committed to delivering the very best digital products and services.
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: 6 Rockfield Business Park Old Station Drive
